TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWorkflowInstanceManagement

Docs.summary: Represents a service contract that defines a set of operations that allow you to control workflow instances.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Abandon (Guid instanceId, string reason);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon(valuetype System.Guid instanceId, string reason) cil managed
Public Sub Abandon (instanceId As Guid, reason As String)
public: void Abandon(Guid instanceId, System::String ^ reason);
abstract member Abandon : Guid * string -> unit

Docs.param: The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to abandon.
The reason for abandoning the workflow instance.
Docs.summary: Attempts to abandon the specified workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This operation is only valid for a workflow instance that is currently loaded in memory. If the specified workflow instance is not loaded or has completed, this operation is a no-op. This operation is not transaction aware.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginAbandon (Guid instanceId, string reason, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginAbandon(valuetype System.Guid instanceId, string reason, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginAbandon (instanceId As Guid, reason As String, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginAbandon(Guid instanceId, System::String ^ reason, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
abstract member BeginAbandon : Guid * string * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to abandon.
The reason for abandoning the workflow instance.
The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.
An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous abandon operation.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous operation to abandon the specified workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The abandon process terminates the workflow instance, destroys all the associated objects, and releases the associated resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginCancel (Guid instanceId, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginCancel(valuetype System.Guid instanceId, class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed

public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginCancel(Guid instanceId, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);
abstract member BeginCancel : Guid * AsyncCallback * obj -> IAsyncResult

Docs.param: The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to cancel.
The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.
An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous cancel operation.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous operation to cancel the specified workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The cancel process quits a workflow instance and returns to the previous state without saving any changes that the workflow may have made.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Cancel (Guid instanceId);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Cancel(valuetype System.Guid instanceId) cil managed
Public Sub Cancel (instanceId As Guid)
public: void Cancel(Guid instanceId);
abstract member Cancel : Guid -> unit

Docs.param: The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to cancel.
Docs.summary: Cancels the specified workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the instance identified by the instance ID does not exist in-memory, an attempt is made to load the instance from the instance store (if persistence has been enabled). If persistence has not been enabled or the instance was not persisted a fault is returned to the caller. Once the in-memory instance has been loaded or identified, this operation cancels the workflow instance.
